{"id":518343066,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 6 months","timestamp":1625590472,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/518343066/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.5 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *result=new ListNode(0);\n        ListNode *temp=result;\n        int carry=0;\n        while(l1||l2||carry)\n        {\n            int val1=l1?l1->val:0;\n            int val2=l2?l2->val:0;\n            temp->next=new ListNode((val1+val2+carry)%10);\n            carry=(val1+val2+carry)/10;\n            temp=temp->next;\n            if(l1)\n                l1=l1->next;\n            if(l2)\n                l2=l2->next;\n            \n        }\n        return result->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
